name: Rage (itch) (Mark Sheeky)
description:
An action adventure for Amiga & Amiga emulators. My 11th Amiga game, I originally released Rage in October 1994 but began work in 1993.

Rage is a top-down shooter with exploration elements. The player traverses a number of scrolling levels to get to the exit. Enemies including replicating bacteria-like creatures, as in my former game Arazmax, and gun turrets. Influences include Gauntlet, Alien Breed. Rage was one of my most accomplished Amiga games. It was signed to be published for a flat fee during development, but as with most of my Amiga titles the company changed their mind as the game neared completion, so I released it as shareware.

Note that you can hold fire to launch a grenade.

Supplied in ADF format for use with Amiga emulators, and in RP9 format for use with Cloanto's Amiga Forever and other RetroPlatform emulators.
